visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a bar chart with the title 'Desktop screen readers'. The chart should have two data series: 'Percentage usage' and 'Test values'. The 'Percentage usage' series should include data points for various screen readers with their respective usage percentages. The 'Test values' series should include arbitrary test values. The chart should have a category x-axis and should be styled with specific colors, font sizes, and other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend.

accessibility.description: This is the most used desktop screen reader

visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a bar chart with specific styling and data series. The chart type is set to 'bar', and it includes a title styled with a specific font family, size, and color. The x-axis is of type 'category', and both the x-axis and y-axis labels are styled with the same font settings. The chart includes two data series: 'Percentage usage' and 'Test values'. The 'Percentage usage' series contains data points for various screen readers with their respective usage percentages, while the 'Test values' series contains arbitrary test values. The chart also includes custom colors for the bars, data labels enabled for better readability, and additional configurations such as disabling credits, enabling exporting, and ensuring accessibility features are enabled.
